title: Account verification catch-22, any help would be awesome!!!
body: So I need to verify my email but every time I request an email to verify it, I never receive the message from riot. The email listed is correct so that is not the issue. The funny thing is that if I try to request a support ticket I cant because my account has to be verified... so basically it's impossible for me to verify my account lol. Any help would be awesome, THANK YOU!!!

I don't work in the account space, but you should be able to use the "Recover my account" option to submit a support request on the Support Site. Otherwise you can send an email to support@riotgames.com.
